text: Garret Neal Graves (born January 31, 1972) is an American politician who has been a member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Louisiana's 6th congressional district from 2015 to 2025. He is a member of the Republican Party. He decided not to run for re-election in 2024. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Garret Graves official U.S. House website * Campaign website * * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Louisiana Category:Politicians from Baton Rouge, Louisiana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Garret Graves
